# lyra-web3-playground

> Free Solidity compiler & Web3 IDE with interactive tutorials. Learn blockchain development, deploy smart contracts to 8+ chains (Ethereum, Polygon, Base, Arbitrum, Solana). Templates for tokens, NFTs, DeFi, DAOs. Monaco Editor, AI assistance, WCAG accessible. Remix alternative. Gas optimization, MetaMask integration, open source. Beginner-friendly.

## Overview

lyra-web3-playground is an open-source project by nirholas. Free Solidity compiler & Web3 IDE with interactive tutorials. Learn blockchain development, deploy smart contracts to 8+ chains (Ethereum, Polygon, Base, Arbitrum, Solana). Templates for tokens, NFTs, DeFi, DAOs. Monaco Editor, AI assistance, WCAG accessible. Remix alternative. Gas optimization, MetaMask integration, open source. Beginner-friendly.
